Sharktilities.credits: Various utility blocks for various operations made by SharkPool

YouTube-Operations.credits: Fetch and play Youtube videos and statistics in your project. Made by SharkPool and contributed to by Nekl300

Time-Calculations.credits: Blocks for calculating time differences. Made by SharkPool

Scratch-Utilities.credits: Blocks for fetching Scratch statistics and info. Made by SharkPool, inspired by NexusKitton's S-Grab

Niche-Toolbox.credits: Utility blocks made by 0znzw. The 'Color at X&Y' and 'Sound to Data.URI' extensions were merged here

Seeds.credits: Generate random seeded numbers, generated terrain, and more! Made by SharkPool

Tune-Shark.credits: Advanced Sound Engine for playing your sounds and more. Made by SharkPool, inspired by LilyMakesThings

Added-Motion.credits: New motion blocks made by SharkPool

Geometry-Dash-API.credits: Fetch Geometry Dash statistics and information. Made by SharkPool. Thank you RobTopGames and ColonGD

Sound-Waves.credits: Play various oscillators in your project. Made by SharkPool

Hyper-Sense.credits: New Sensing blocks made by SharkPool

Better-Input.credits: Expansion of the 'Ask and Wait' block using CSS. Made by SharkPool

Camera-Sensing-Plus.credits: Better Camera Sensing extension for sprites. Apply green screens and more! Made by SharkPool

Particle-Tools.credits: Tools that make creating particle systems easy! Made by SharkPool

Image-Effects.credits: Apply new, non-vanilla effects and edits to images and sprites! Made by SharkPool

Recording.credits: Utility blocks for recording yourself while your project runs. Made by SharkPool

Newgrounds-Audio.credits: Fetch audio and audio information from Newgrounds. Made by SharkPool, works best with Tune Shark

Sprite-Parenting.credits: Link sprites together and make them follow the parent's data. Made by SharkPool

Lazy-Collisions.credits: Utility blocks that make detecting collisions easy and fast. Made by SharkPool

Files-Expanded.credits: New Blocks added to GarboMuffin's File Extension. Made by SharkPool and Martinelplayz.

Gamepad-Expanded.credits: New Blocks added to Garbomuffin's Gamepad Extension. Made by Martinelplayz.

GAL text: SharkPool's collection of TurboWarp Extensions. Most Extensions were made or contributed to by SharkPool. Hover for Details.
